title._content: Richmond, Virginia. Ballard house on Franklin Street. (Photographer's tent in foreground) (LOC)

description._content: Richmond, Virginia. Ballard house on Franklin Street. (Photographer's tent in foreground) 1865 Apr. 1 negative : glass, stereograph, wet collodion ; 4 x 10 in. Notes: Title from Civil War caption books. Caption from negative sleeve: Photographer's tent. File print in LOT 4162-C. Forms part of Civil War glass negative collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865. Format: Glass negatives--1860-1870. Stereographs--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cwpb.00476 Call Number: LC-B815- 963
